summary: Syntax File for files with extensions .sbl
name: Siebel-VB-Script-SVB
description: Siebel VBScript Syntax File. Since SVB is based on VBScript, this file takes the basic work by Johannes Zellner <johannes@zellner.org> on VB syntax files and adds support for Siebel specific stuff
install_details: Just take sbl.vim and put it into $VIM/vimfiles/syntax (where $VIM is where ur Vim is installed). Its that simple.
